Container.Name: SABnzbdH
Container.Overview: [span style=\'color: #0046FF;\']library/mariadb:label[br] Docker image for Hurricanes SABnzbd[br][br] [span style=\'color: #00FF23;\'] Add a :label tag to the Repository field[br][br] [/span] For example: [br] hurricane/sabnzbd:latest[br] If you do not add a label it will pull :latest version.[br][br] Run Example:[br] docker run -d --net=bridge -v /*your_config__location*:/config \ -v /*additional_location*:/mnt \ -e TZ=America/Edmonton \ -p 8081:8081 \ --name=SABnzbdH hurricane/docker-sabnzbd[br][br]

Config.Name: Config directory
Config.Description: Host path to store SABnzbd configuration files.

Config.Name: User ID
Config.Description: User ID the container will be run with.

Config.Name: Group ID
Config.Description: Group ID the container will be run with.
